params.recipient: The recipient of the underlying ERC1155, ERC721, ERC20 tokens of the wrapped NFT.
params.tokenId: The token Id of the wrapped NFT to unwrap.

params.recipient: The recipient of the wrapped NFT.
params.uriForWrappedToken: The metadata URI for the wrapped NFT.

unwrap(uint256,address).notice: Unwrap a wrapped NFT to retrieve underlying ERC1155, ERC721, ERC20 tokens.

wrap((address,uint8,uint256,uint256)[],s.notice: Wrap multiple ERC1155, ERC721, ERC20 tokens into a single wrapped NFT.
